ModMetadata.Name: Save Recovery
ModMetadata.Author: tom_is_unlucky
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Save Recovery[/h1] Allows your saves to load if they contain things that were in a removed mod. [h2][b]Warning: The items from removed mods will still be removed from your game, it just won't crash when loading.[/b][/h2]
[url=https://github.com/tsholmes/StationeersSaveRecovery]Source on Github[/url]
This requires BepInEx and a modloader installed. Try out [url=https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad]StationeersLaunchPad[/url]. (also compatible with StationeersMods)
